Interface ResponseSelectorInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ResponseSelector

    public interface ResponseSelectorInterface
    This interface sets up the method signatures for the response selector component. The functions of this component include taking in a list of keywords and selecting the most appropriate response template to be used. Notifying the underlying ResponseGraph which response template has been selected so that the ResponseGraph can update to the new position in the ResponseGraph.
    Author:
    Yasha

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ResponseTemplate selectTemplate(KeyWordList keys)
      Selects the most relevant response template by using the keywords from the last user input.

    • Method Detail

      • selectTemplate

        ResponseTemplate selectTemplate(KeyWordList keys)
        Selects the most relevant response template by using the keywords from the last user input.
        Parameters:
        keys - List of keywords selected by the LP
        Returns:
        Returns a pointer to the selected response template.
